name: Take your brother with you
description:
A puzzle platformer about brotherly love

Take your sibling to places!

Around 10 quick levels

**********

made for the GMTK Jam 2021. The theme was joined together!

Controls:

  • arrow keys to move
  • Z to jump
  • X to grab/throw brother
  • R to restart the level
  • Esc to quit

code and art by me, carne_guisada

music is Gone Fishin', by You're Perfect Studio (https://opengameart.org/content/gone-fishin)

pallete is Ice Cream GB Pallete, by Kerrie Lake (https://lospec.com/palette-list/ice-cream-gb)
